statements: SELECT * FROM customer_credit_scores;
SELECT customer_id, credit_score FROM customer_credit_scores WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT customer_id, credit_score FROM customer_credit_scores WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM customer_credit_scores WHERE credit_score BETWEEN 600 AND 800;
SELECT customer_id, credit_score FROM customer_credit_scores ORDER BY credit_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_credit_scores WHERE credit_score > 700 ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, credit_score FROM customer_credit_scores WHERE credit_score BETWEEN 600 AND 800 ORDER BY credit_score ASC;
SELECT customer_id, credit_score, financial_information FROM customer_credit_scores WHERE credit_score < 500 ORDER BY customer_id ASC, financial_information DESC;
SELECT customer_id, financial_information FROM customer_credit_scores WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, credit_score FROM customer_credit_scores WHERE credit_score >= 650 AND financial_information IS NOT NULL ORDER BY credit_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, credit_score FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, income, debt FROM financial_info;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT customer_name, income FROM customers INNER JOIN financial_info ON customers.customer_id = financial_info.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, credit_score FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT customers.customer_name, financial_info.income FROM customers INNER JOIN financial_info ON customers.customer_id = financial_info.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, income - debt AS net_worth FROM customers JOIN financial_info ON customers.customer_id = financial_info.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY credit_score DESC, customer_name ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT customer_id, credit_score FROM credit_scores;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_info;
SELECT income, expenses, savings FROM financial_info;
SELECT * FROM customer_info;
SELECT customer_id, income, expenses FROM financial_info ORDER BY income DESC;
SELECT * FROM credit_scores ORDER BY credit_score DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_info WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT customer_id, income, expenses FROM financial_info WHERE income > expenses;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, f.income FROM customer_info c INNER JOIN financial_info f ON c.customer_id = f.customer_id;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, f.savings FROM customer_info c LEFT JOIN financial_info f ON c.customer_id = f.customer_id WHERE f.savings > 5000;

SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT customer_name, loan_amount FROM customers JOIN loans ON customers.customer_id = loans.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, payment_amount, payment_date FROM payments WHERE payment_amount >= 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, annual_income, expenses FROM customers JOIN financial_information USING(customer_id);

SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE credit_score BETWEEN 600 AND 800;
SELECT customer_name, loan_amount, interest_rate FROM customers INNER JOIN loans ON customers.customer_id = loans.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, payment_amount, payment_date FROM customers INNER JOIN loans ON customers.customer_id = loans.customer_id INNER JOIN payments ON loans.loan_id = payments.loan_id;
SELECT customer_name, annual_income, expenses FROM customers INNER JOIN financial_information ON customers.customer_id = financial_information.customer_id;

SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT customer_name, annual_income FROM customers JOIN employment ON customers.customer_id = employment.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE loan_amount > 50000 ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT addresses.customer_id, street_address, city, state, zip_code FROM addresses JOIN customers ON addresses.customer_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE credit_score > 700;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE credit_score < 600 ORDER BY credit_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM loans WHERE loan_status = 'approved' AND loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT customer_name, payment_amount, payment_date FROM customers JOIN payments ON customers.customer_id = payments.customer_id WHERE payments.payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, employer_name, annual_income FROM customers JOIN employment ON customers.customer_id = employment.customer_id WHERE annual_income > 80000 ORDER BY annual_income DESC;
